nodes.bodyText: This is a good change. Glad to see it.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -43,51 +40,23 @@ public abstract Descriptor getDescriptor(); /** - * Returns the data {@link LongPoint}s for this metric, or {@code null} if the {@link - * Descriptor.Type} of the metric does not generate this type of points. + * Returns the data {@link Point}s for this metric. * - *

Only one type of points are available at any moment for a {@link MetricData}. + *

Only one type of points are available at any moment for a {@link MetricData}, and the type + * is determined by the {@link Descriptor.Type}. * * @return the data {@link Point}s for this metric, or {@code null} if this type of points are not * accepted. * @since 0.3.0 */ - @Nullable - public abstract Collection getLongPoints(); + public abstract Collection getPoints();
